items.title: Heavyweight TKV stuns Clarke to win British title
items.summary: Jeamie 'TKV' Tshikeva sensationally beat Frazer Clarke by split-decision to claim the British heavyweight title on a significant night for the sport.

items.title: Sunderland come back from two down to beat Bournemouth
items.summary: Sunderland fight back from being two goals down to Bournemouth after the first fifteen minutes to go on and claim a 3-2 win in torrential conditions at the Stadium of Light.

items.title: Thiago scores twice as Brentford beat Burnley
items.summary: Late goals from Igor Thiago and Dango Ouattara lead Brentford to a 3-1 victory against Burnley to move the Bees up to eighth in the Premier League table.

items.title: Fulham make blistering start to beat Spurs & increase pressure on Frank
items.summary: Fulham score two goals in the opening six minutes to secure a 2-1 victory at Tottenham and inflict a fourth home defeat in seven Premier League games this season for Thomas Frank's side.

items.title: Newcastle defeat Everton for first league away win
items.summary: Malick Thiaw scores twice to help Newcastle United beat Everton 4-1 and claim their first away win of the season in the premier league.

items.title: Foden stars as Man City leave it late to beat Leeds
items.summary: Phil Foden scores in the first minute for Manchester City and again in injury time to secure a 3-2 against Leeds United at the Etihad Stadium.

items.title: Newcastle make 'big step forward' for 'fed up' Howe
items.summary: Newcastle United finally end their seven-month wait for an away league victory in style against Everton at the Hill Dickinson Stadium.

items.title: How to Watch Hallmark Channelâ€™s â€˜A Grand Ole Opry Christmasâ€™ Movie OnlineÂ Free
items.summary: Part of Hallmark's 'Countdown to Christmas' event, the country music-themed holiday film features Brad Paisley, Megan Moroney and Mickey Guyton among others.
items.body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Hallmark Channel is bringing some Christmas cheer to Nashville with the premiere of the new original holiday movie, A Grand Ole Opry Christmas . GET: DIRECTV STREAM 5-DAY FREE TRIAL Airing Nov. 29 live on Hallmark Channel, the new film features some familiar faces from country music, while helping to celebrate the Opry’s 100th anniversary . Those stars include Opry member Brad Paisley, who also wrote the original music for  A Grand Ole Opry Christmas  and performs in the film. Other country singers appearing in the movie include Megan Moroney, Pam Tillis, Drew Baldridge and Mickey Guyton. Want to watch A Grand Ole Opry Christmas ? Here’s what you need to know. A Grand Ole Opry Christmas Airdate, Time A Grand Ole Opry Christmas airs Friday, Nov. 29 at 8 p.m. ET/PT on Hallmark Channel and you can watch the country-themed holiday movie on TV with any cable package that includes Hallmark Channel. How to Watch A Grand Ole â€¦

items.title: Tom Stoppard â€” Sparkling, Tony- and Oscar-Winning Writer for the Stage and Screen â€” Dies atÂ 88
items.summary: "A giant of the English theater ... He had a dazzling wit and loved classical and popular music alike which often featured in his huge body of work,â€ says Mick Jagger, producer of Stoppard's 'Enigma.'
items.body: British playwright Tom Stoppard , a playful, probing dramatist who won an Academy Award for the screenplay for 1998â€™s Shakespeare in Love , has died. He was 88. Related Gone But Not Forgotten: Musicians We Lost in 2025 The 50 Best Rock Bands (Full List): Staff Picks Lululemon's Black Friday Sale Includes 50% Off Similiar Pieces Worn by Olivia Rodrigo and Jennie In a statement Saturday (Nov. 29), United Agents said the Czech-born Stoppard â€” often hailed as the greatest British playwright of his generation â€” died â€œpeacefullyâ€ at his home in Dorset in southwest England, surrounded by his family. â€œHe will be remembered for his works, for their brilliance and humanity, and for his wit, his irreverence, his generosity of spirit and his profound love of the English language,â€ they said. â€œIt was an honor to work with Tom and to know him.â€ Rolling Stones frontman  Mick Jagger  was among those paying tribute, calling Stoppard â€œa giant of the English theater, both highly intellectual and very funny in all his plays and scripts. â€œHe had a dazzling wit and loved classical and popular music alike which often featured in his huge body of work,â€ said Jagger, whoâ€¦

items.title: Hennessy stays undefeated with win over Bytyqi
items.summary: Francesca Hennessy remains undefeated in seven fights as all three judges score it 100-90 in her favour over Fabiana Bytyqi.

items.title: What has happened to Hearts' early-season 'swagger'?
items.summary: Derek McInnes admits table-topping Hearts are seeking to rediscover their early-season "swagger" after spilling more points.

items.title: Liverpool in trio chasing Ndiaye - Sunday's gossip
items.summary: Liverpool are one of three clubs to enquire about Everton's Iliman Ndiaye while Manchester United's hopes of signing Adam Wharton may depend on European qualification.

items.title: A 'waste of England's time' - what did Wiegman learn from Lionesses' stroll?
items.summary: England fans could not have hoped for a more entertaining evening at Wembley Stadium - but with Sarina Wiegman resisting the urge to be more experimental, how much did she actually learn from it?

items.title: Late goals seal dramatic victory for Bayern against St Pauli
items.summary: Luis Diaz and Nicolas Jackson score two goals in injury time to seal a dramatic 3-1 victory for Bayern Munich against St Pauli and move the Bundesliga holders eight points clear at the top of the table.

items.title: Radiohead Breaks Metallicaâ€™s Attendance Record at Londonâ€™s O2Â Arena
items.summary: The iconic U.K. band played four sold-out shows at the venue in November.
items.body: Radiohead is making history at Londonâ€™s O2 Arena. Following four sold-out shows earlier this month, the iconic U.K. band broke the venueâ€™s attendance record, previously held by Metallica in 2017. Related Radiohead Make Epic Return to the U.K. With Greatest Hits Set in London: Best Moments Radiohead Returns for First Show Since 2018: Every Song From Opening Night in Madrid Radiohead’s ‘Hail to the Thief’ Live Album Makes Top 10 Debut on 4 Charts The Oxford-formed band played the O2 on Nov. 21 , 22, 24 and 25, with each show drawing more than 22,200 concert-goers, and the final show reaching 22,355 attendees, the venue announce d on X . â€œThese past four record-breaking nights will go down in the venueâ€™s history, with Radiohead breaking the attendance records each night,â€ Christian Dâ€™Acuna, the O2’s senior programming director, said in a statement. â€œWe knew how special these exclusive shows would be and weâ€™re so grateful to the band for bringing them to the O2. Itâ€™s been a true honor to host them, and each night they played different set lists spanning their incredible back catalogue. These shows will be remembered for years to come.â€ After a seâ€¦

items.title: 'Riding a wave' - Sunderland extend unbeaten home run
items.summary: Sunderland's 'fabulous' form at Stadium of Light propels them up to fourth in the Premier League table.

items.title: Man City 'bend rules' to deny Leeds - Farke

items.title: Kelly Clarkson Joins Spotifyâ€™s Billions Club With â€˜Since U BeenÂ Goneâ€™
items.summary: The song reached No. 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart in 2005.
items.body: Kelly Clarkson has officially joined Spotifyâ€™s Billions Club. The 43-year-old pop superstar and talk show host earned her place in the streaming serviceâ€™s elite circle as her hit â€œSince U Been Goneâ€ became her first song to surpass 1 billion streams on Spotify. Related Kelly Clarkson’s Hit ‘Since U Been Gone’ Turns 10: 7 Great Performances Kelly Clarkson’s 10 Greatest Performances Kelly Clarkson Reveals Her Top Three Albums of All-Time: ‘I Hope You Like Them, If You Don’t, You’re Dumb’ The pop-rock anthem was released as the second single from Clarksonâ€™s 2004 album, Breakaway , and reached No. 2 on the Billboard Hot 100 chart the following year. Written and produced by Max Martin and Dr. Luke, â€œSince U Been Goneâ€ won a Grammy Award in 2006 for best female pop vocal performance. Its music video also earned two MTV Video Music Awards in 2005 for best female video and best pop video. Reflecting on the song in a 2020 interview with Apple Music, the American Idol alum said, â€œI love what the song does for people, I love that it was very different in demo form sent to me. Behind the scenes, it was not so fun to record becauseâ€¦

items.title: Title hopeful Norris beaten to Qatar pole by rival Piastri
items.summary: Oscar Piastri pips McLaren team-mate and title rival Lando Norris to pole position for the potentially title-deciding Qatar Grand Prix.

items.title: 'Referee lost control' - Iraola defends ill-disciplined Bournemouth
items.summary: Bournemouth manager Andoni Iraola says that the referee lost control of the game, with the Cherries losing three players for their next match to suspension in a 3-2 loss at Sunderland.

items.title: Foden is having a really good season - Guardiola
items.summary: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says Phil Foden is having a "really good season" after the England international scored a late winner against Leeds United to move them within four points of league leaders Arsenal.

items.title: Diddy Helps Organize Prison Thanksgiving Meal for Inmates While BehindÂ Bars
items.summary: â€œThanksgiving, to me, is about making sure other people eat," the disgraced hip-hop mogul told TMZ.
items.body: Sean â€œDiddyâ€ Combs is supporting his fellow inmates this Thanksgiving. While serving his first year at FCI Fort Dix in New Jersey, the 56-year-old disgraced hip-hop mogul helped organize and fund a Thanksgiving meal for 1,000 inmates at the federal correctional institution on Thursday (Nov. 27), according to TMZ . Related Diddy Release Date Pushed Back Amid Prison Violation Reports: When Will He Be Set Free? 50 Cent Reacts to Diddy Verdict: ‘That Boy a Bad Man’ Diddy Attorney Confirms They’ve Reached Out to Trump Administration About Possible Pardon: ‘He Remains Hopeful’ â€œThanksgiving, to me, is about making sure other people eat,â€ Diddy told the outlet through his representative. â€œEverybody misses their family. People get depressed during the holidays. We just wanted to come together as a family and do our own thing.â€ Working with a group called Bankroll Bosses, Diddy and others collected commissary food, spent two days preparing it, and distributed meals to every housing unit at Fort Dix. The Thanksgiving-Day menu included roast turkey with trimmings, mashed potatoes, corn and dessert. Without proper cooking materials, the group resorâ€¦

items.title: Bob â€˜Bongoâ€™ Starkie, Guitarist for Australiaâ€™s Skyhooks, Dies atÂ 73
items.summary: His death was confirmed on Tuesday on the groupâ€™s official Facebook page.
items.body: Bob â€œBongoâ€ Starkie, guitarist for the trailblazing Australian rock band Skyhooks, has died at 73 after a year-long battle with acute myeloid leukemia. His death was confirmed Tuesday on the groupâ€™s official Facebook page. Skyhooks archivist Peter Green announced the news, writing that Starkie â€œpassed away early this morningâ€ after spending the past year undergoing treatment while still hoping to return to the stage. Green remembered him as the youngest member of the band who â€œembraced the theatricsâ€ that became a signature part of Skyhooksâ€™ identity â€” from bold makeup and elaborate stage outfits to the irreverent swagger that helped define the groupâ€™s rise. â€œThe music always came first,â€ Green wrote, adding that performing live â€œwas his absolute joyâ€ and that â€œmusic was in his blood till the very end.â€ Starkie joined Skyhooks in August 1973, replacing his older brother Peter Starkie, who died in 2020 at age 72 following complications from a fall. Peter was one of the musicians who helped establish the early lineup that would go on to dominate Australian rock in the mid-1970s. In a tribute shared through the bandâ€™s page , Starkieâ€™s daughter Indiana said her father â€œpeacefully depaâ€¦

items.title: Sphere Entertainment Shares Up 11% as Music Stocks Have a Rare WinningÂ Week
items.summary: Warner Music Group finished the week ended Nov. 28 down 8% â€” but the loss came before news of the licensing agreement with AI music platform Suno.
items.body: Sphere Entertainment Co. shares jumped 11.2% to $76.04 in the week ended Nov. 28. Despite frequent news reports that tourism in down in Las Vegas, the Sphere venueâ€™s growth has propelled shares of its parent, Sphere Entertainment Co., to a 99.2% gain in 2025. While no market-moving news was released this week, a steady stream of news has painted a positive picture for the venue. The company announced in October that its remake of The Wizard of Oz surpassed $130 million in sales and more than 1 million tickets. Earlier this month, Sphere announced additional shows in The Eagles residency , bringing the bandâ€™s run to a venue record of 56 shows. Earlier this week, Sphere Entertainment Co. announced that Christopher Winters was appointed senior vice president, controller and principal accounting officer. Music stocks had a rare positive week as the 19-company Billboard Global Music Index (BGMI) gained 1.0% to 2,597.30. With 14 of the indexâ€™s companies in positive territory, the slight improvement marked the BGMIâ€™s first gain in 11 weeks. Year-to-date, the index is up 20.5% but is 16.7% below its all-time high of 3,117.20 set during the week ended June 30. Markets around the globe outpâ€¦

items.title: Lululemonâ€™s Black Friday Sale Includes 50% Off Similiar Pieces Worn by Olivia Rodrigo andÂ Jennie
items.summary: The brand also counts Kelsea Ballerini and F1 star Lewis Hamilton as an ambassadors.
items.body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Lululemon is one of the most popular activewear and athleisure brands among celebrities these days, with musicians like Olivia Rodrigo, Addison Rae and BLACKPINK’s Jennie having been spotted wearing lululemon in recent months, and country star Kelsea Ballerini starring in the brand’s spring campaign . SHOP LULULEMON BLACK FRIDAY WEEKEND SALE F1 driver, Lewis Hamilton , meantime, is a lululemon ambassador and recently went viral for “impersonating” a store employee and surprising fans . If all the celeb publicity wasn’t enough, Lululemon’s belt bags and shoulder bags have been a staple at music festivals and sporting events alike. Lululemon rarely goes on sale, and when their pieces do get discounted, they’re often hidden on the site’s “ We Made Too Much ” section. Fortunately, the brand is opening up its Black Friday sale to everyone with up to 50% off sweatshirts, hoodies, leggings, yoga pâ€¦

items.title: Lululemonâ€™s Viral $58 Purse Has Reviewers Ditching Designer Bags â€” and Itâ€™s $10 Cheaper Than LastÂ Year
items.summary: The Everywhere Belt Bag isn't the only carry-all Lululemon is known for these days.
items.body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Lululemon has grown a cult following of loyal shoppers who consider it one of the best athleisure brands out there. But besides offering the coveted Everywhere Belt Bag and “buttery soft” Align Pants , the lifestyle apparel brand is now going viral for its Mini Shoulder Bag , which has reviewers obsessed with its designer-like look and “unmatched material.” Thousands of videos have been created on TikTok about the shoulder bag, and you’ve likely seen the Mini Shoulder Bag in real life too, as it’s great for casual errands and date nights alike. Though it’s been known to sell out, the viral Lululemon purse is back in stock for the holidays at lululemon.com . And while a similar model was retailing for $68+ last year, the current City Essentials Mini Shoulder Bag is now available for just $58 — $10 cheaper than this time 12 months ago. Keep reading to find out how to pick up the bag and what reviewers arâ€¦
